subject: Federal Bureau of Investigatio
body:
Federal Bureau of Investigation,
FOREIGN AFFAIR COMMISION UNIT.
J.Edgar.Hoover Building
935 Pennsylvania Avenue,
NW Washington, D.C.
20535-0001, USA.
Attention-xxx
My friend, I received your mail, below is the representing attorney account details where you are expected to send the court administration charge $1,550.00USD.
as soon as you send the money send me the transfer slip confirmation so that everything will be finalized and you will be updated with your fund payment as you requested.
Chase Bank
Account Name: M. A. LLC 
Routing Number: 111000614
Acct Number: 71061xxxx
Swift code: CHASUS33
Bank Address: 6701 S Texas Houston TX 77083
The attorney also accept bitcoin payment.
below is also the attorney bitcoin wallet address, you can make the payment to it or the above account details.
bc1q4cysqdtz79yugend9mv67wr33vc2dhw6mn5avp
Thanks, I await your urgent response.
Yours sincerely,
MR.WILBUR  GREGORY
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION
J.Edgar.Hoover Building
935 Pennsylvania Avenue,
NW Washington, D.C.
20535-0001, USA
Note: this email contains confidential mail and can only be read by the address email.

subject: Re: Federal Bureau of Investigatio
body:
Dear Gregory,

Thank you for your response. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding with the payment. Could you please provide me with more details about the court charge and why it is necessary? Also, could you explain how this process works and what guarantees I have that my funds will be secure?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Otis

subject: Attenrion: Otis, from Federal Bureau of Investigatio
body:
Federal Bureau of Investigation,
FOREIGN AFFAIR COMMISION UNIT.
J.Edgar.Hoover Building
935 Pennsylvania Avenue,
NW Washington, D.C.
20535-0001, USA.

Attention-Otis

My friend I received your mail and I understand all you have said, I must
tell you that what you need to do is to process this approved fund of
$20million Us on ground.

You must understand that without proper court authorization it is
impossible to claim this fund to your account, Because the fund is in the
principal account of the US Treasury Bank, the legal process must be
followed, it is not in our power to take decisions, the required
$2,300.00USD is for court of claim for processing and administration
authorization ORDER if paid everything will be done successful and the fund
will be transferred to your account without any problem.

So indicate the option you consider most convenient to receive your fund
payment.

1} PAYMENT BY ATM CARD

:2} PAYMENT BY BANK DRAFT:

3}PAYMENT BY DIRECT WIRE TRANSFER:

With any of the above options you choose we guarantee the receipt of your
fund to be successfully delivered to you within two days as long as you
comply with my directive.

To effect the release of your fund valued at $20million us dollars you are
advised to reconfirm the below details for further process.

1. Full Name:......................

2.Contact Address:......................
3.Phone:......................
4.Fax Number (if Any)......................
5.A Copy of Your Identity:......................
6.Age:......................
7.Marital Status:......................
8.Country:......................
9.Occupation:......................

Upon receipt of the above information we will proceed to get your payment
done.

Yours sincerely,

MR.WILBUR GREGORY
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION
J.Edgar.Hoover Building
935 Pennsylvania Avenue,
NW Washington, D.C.
20535-0001, USA

subject: Re: Federal Bureau of Investigatio
body:
FOREIGN AFFAIR COMMISION UNIT.
J.Edgar.Hoover Building
935 Pennsylvania Avenue,
NW Washington, D.C.
20535-0001, USA.

Attention-Otis

My friend, we receive your mail I must let you know that this 100% sure and
legit, as long as you comply with our directives everything will be
finalized within three working days.
We understand that you have chosen payment by Direct wire Transfer.

Before we proceed , like you have been informed in my first mail, I must
let you know that you are only oblige to pay $2,300 for the court
administration and court ORDER authorization of your fund, the court order
will be sent to the paying bank to credit your account, because without the
court order, the bank have no access or right to pay the beneficiary,
remember the fund is not in your account, the Bank needs court
authorization before they can access the fund with the US treasury, one
again, i must let you know that this program is 100% legit and real, we are
not allowed to pay fees for anybody, you think about it, if we are allowed
to do such thing them there is no need contacting you, I will just pay the
fees and get the fund all to myself, that is why the court prohibit payment
from anybody excerpt from the beneficiary.
Get back to me so that I can instruct you how to send the money to finalize
everything Okay.

Thanks, I wait your urgent response

Yours sincerely,

MR.WILBUL GREGORY
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION
J.Edgar.Hoover Building
935 Pennsylvania Avenue,
NW Washington, D.C.
20535-0001, USA

Note: this email contains confidential mail and can only be read by the
address email.

subject: Re: Federal Bureau of Investigatio
body:
Dear Gregory,

Thank you for your prompt response. I understand the need for the court order and I am ready to comply with all necessary requirements. 

However, before we proceed, could you please provide me with more details about the payment? How much is required for the court order and what is the preferred method of payment?

I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Otis

subject: Re: Federal Bureau of Investigatio....Are you Ok?
body:
Dear Gregory,

Thank you for your prompt response. I am excited about the prospect of receiving my green card and starting a new life in the United States.

Regarding the payment methods, I would prefer to make the payment via direct wire transfer as it is more convenient for me. Please provide me with the necessary bank details so that I can proceed with the transfer.

Here are my details:

Full Name: Lewis D. Noogie
Address: 123 Main Street, Novosibirsk, Latvia
Number: +371 12345678
Status: Single

I will send a copy of my identity document separately for security reasons.

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Otis
